rukus.text: Niccayamaka nam musavin mitum, harun mitum arul purintom
avviruvaraiyum, avarkalutaiya makkalaiyum katumaiyana tunpattiliruntu patukattuk kontom
avarkalukku utavipurintom. Akave, avarkal (tankal etirikalai) verri kontarkal
avviruvarukkum telivana vetattaiyum nam kotuttom
avviruvaraiyum nerana valiyilum nam celuttinom
pirkalattilum avviruvarin kirttiyai nilaikkac ceytom
(akave, ulakattilullavarkal) musavukkum, harunukkum ‘‘salam'' iterram untavataka! (Enru kurukinranar)
niccayamaka nam ivvare nanmai ceypavarkalukkuk kuli kotukkirom
niccayamaka avviruvarum, nampikkai konta nam atiyarkalil iruntanar
niccayamaka ilyasum nam tutarkalil oruvartan
avar tan makkalai nokki, ‘‘ninkal (allahvukkup) payappata ventama?'' Enru kuriya camayattil
‘‘pataippavarkalil mika alakanavanai ninkal purakkanittu vittu, ‘pa'alu' ennum cilaiyai vanankukirirkala
unkal iraivanum, mun cenra unkal mutataiyarkalin iraivanumana allahvai vittu vitukirirkala
ayinum, avarkal avaraip poyyakki vittanar. Atalal, niccayamaka avarkal (marumaiyil nam'mitam tantanaikkakak) kontu varappatuvarkal
allahvutaiya kalapparra atiyarkalait tavira, (nallatiyarkalukku nalla canmanamuntu)
pirkalattil ullavarkalilum ivarutaiya kirttiyai nilaikkac ceytom
(akave ulakattilullavarkal) ‘‘ilyasukku ‘‘salam'' (iterram) untavatakuka!'' (Enru kurukinranar)
niccayamaka nanmai ceypavarkalukku nam ivvare kuli kotukkirom
niccayamaka avar nampikkai konta nam atiyarkalil oruvaraka iruntar
niccayamaka luttum nam tutarkalil oruvartan
Avaraiyum avarutaiya kutumpam muluvataiyum patukattuk kontom
ayinum, (avarutaiya) oru kila (manai)viyait tavira, aval (antap pavikalutan) tankivittal
(piraku pavam ceyta) marravarkalaiyum nam alittu vittom
akave, (makkavacikale! Ninkal varttakattirkaka sam tecam pokumpolutum, varumpolutum) kalaiyilo malaiyilo, niccayamaka ninkal (alintupona) avarkalai katantu celkirirkal
(itaik kontu ninkal) nallarivu peraventama
